snippet.title: Demon's Mirror - Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
🪞Demon's Mirror is coming to Steam on September 5th!🪞

Demon’s Mirror combines roguelike deckbuilding and a grid manipulation battle system to create a unique experience where Slay the Spire meets Puzzle Quest.

Play as one of three trapped souls and embark on a treacherous journey where your worst nightmares lie in ambush! Collect new cards and gain power as you navigate an ever-changing labyrinth of increasing challenges to solve the mystery of the demonic mirror that trapped you here.

Check out Demon's Mirror on Steam! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1600910/Demons_Mirror/

And on socials:
🐺Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/BeRad_Ent
🐺Discord: https://discord.gg/demonsmirror
🐺Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BeRadEntertainment

Good Shepherd Entertainment:
🐺Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/GoodShepherdEnt
🐺TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@goodshepherdent

Good Shepherd Entertainment is an award-winning independent game publisher specializing in cult-classic IP adaptations. The company has built a robust global footprint, shepherding talented and innovative development teams to create games that delight, surprise, challenge, and - most importantly - entertain. We’ve done this by pairing creators with writers, musicians, and IP powerhouses and through strategic partnerships with some of the industry’s most notable names, including Devolver Digital, Croteam and Mike Bithell. In addition to the critically acclaimed John Wick: Hex, GSE’s titles include Monster Train, Phantom Doctrine, the Transport Fever and Hard West series, Showgunners, and Hellboy Web of Wyrd.
